files.patch:
@@ -140,0 +140,2 @@
+    const tstring runtimeBinPath = FileUtils::mkpath()
+            << appImageRoot << _T("runtime") << _T("bin");
@@ -149,0 +151,4 @@
+    // zip.dll may be loaded by java without full path
+    // make sure it will look in runtime/bin
+    SetDllDirectory(runtimeBinPath.c_str());
